name: Crazy Machine Sky Battle
description:
Driving a fantastic sky aircraft, by sliding the plane, rotating, swinging weapons to attack the enemy, using hammers, axes, hammers and other weapons to smash the enemy!
It's an easy-to-play game
. You can mix the fuselage and weapons at will, and combine the strongest fighting machines to fight against each powerful BOSS.
All kinds of interesting weapon types and body appearance can be purchased with gold coins obtained in the game
. Vivid enemy AI, showing the effect of multi-player melee game.
Flip your weapons in the chaotic battlefield, evade the enemy's missiles, destroy all the enemy's aircraft, and kill a bloodstream!
